title: Could not call emscripten_asm_const_int with the result of stringify
body:
I'm using Emscripten and trying to embed js. I declared Emscripten intrinsic `emscripten_asm_const_int`:

```Rust
extern "C" {
    fn emscripten_asm_const_int(code: *const u8, ...) -> i32;
}
```

And then tried to use it:

```Rust
emscripten_asm_const_int(concat!(stringify!(
    var aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0;
    aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0;
    aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0;
    aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0;
), '\0') as *const str as *const u8);
```

This fails to compile:

```
...
imdBool32x4": 0,"simdBool64x2": 0,"maxGlobalAlign": 8,"namedGlobals": {},"asmConsts": {"0": ["var aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0 ; aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0 ; aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0 ; aaaaaaaaaaaa = 0
          ;", ["i"]]}
          }

          Traceback (most recent call last):
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emcc", line 13, in <module>
              emcc.run()
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emcc.py", line 1540, in run
              final = shared.Building.emscripten(final, append_ext=False, extra_args=extra_args)
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/tools/shared.py", line 2020, in emscripten
              call_emscripten(cmdline)
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emscripten.py", line 2246, in _main
              temp_files.run_and_clean(lambda: main(
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/tools/tempfiles.py", line 78, in run_and_clean
              return func()
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emscripten.py", line 2251, in <lambda>
              DEBUG=DEBUG,
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emscripten.py", line 2151, in main
              temp_files=temp_files, DEBUG=DEBUG)
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emscripten.py", line 94, in emscript
              funcs, metadata, mem_init = parse_backend_output(backend_output, DEBUG)
            File "/home/user/.emsdk/emscripten/1.37.22/emscripten.py", line 150, in parse_backend_output
              raise e
          ValueError: Invalid control character at: line 22 column 460 (char 137022)
```

The issue here is that `stringify!` macro generates newlines and Emscripten doesn't seem to like newlines in this intrinsic. Not sure where it should be fixed, in Rust or Emscripten.

cc @alexcrichton @kripken
